path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/QuillAudits/MrWeb Finance Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

project_info.project_path: Experiments/contracts/MrWeb Finance Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits/ama_v2

findings.title: Absence of comments
findings.description: Proper code commenting is required to help users understand the principal reason behind the withdrawal of tokens and BNB from the contracts.

findings.title: Transfer of Ownership Must be a Two-way process
findings.description: The transferOwnership() function allows the current owner to transfer his privileges to another address, but it would be safer if the transition is managed by implementing a two-step approach: _transferOwnership() and _updateOwnership().

findings.title: Absence of comments
